name: Surefire Javelin
name_jp: アブソートジャベリン
effect_desc1: Increases damage dealt by 1% of the target's Max Health when attacking a single target
effect_desc1_jp: 敵単体を攻撃時、対象の最大HPの1%ダメージがUPする。
effect_desc1_kr: 단일 대상 공격 시 대상의 전체 체력의 1% 만큼 피해량 증가
effect_desc4: Increases damage dealt by 2% of the target's Max Health when attacking a single target
effect_desc4_jp: 敵単体を攻撃時、対象の最大HPの2%ダメージがUPする。
effect_desc4_kr: 단일 대상 공격 시 대상의 전체 체력의 2% 만큼 피해량 증가

name: Talisman of Animosities
effect_desc1: +5% Priority to the caster when using a single-target skill
effect_desc1_jp: 敵単体にスキル使用時、自分の行動ゲージが+5%UPする。
effect_desc1_kr: 단일 대상 스킬 사용 시 자신의 행동 게이지 +5%
effect_desc4: +10% Priority to the caster when using a single-target skill
effect_desc4_jp: 敵単体にスキル使用時、自分の行動ゲージが+10%UPする。
effect_desc4_kr: 단일 대상 스킬 사용 시 자신의 행동 게이지 +10%

name: Heartunder's Blade
name_jp: ハートアンダーブレード
effect_desc1: Has a 50% chance to inflict Burned for 2 turn(s) when attacking a single target
effect_desc1_jp: 敵単体を攻撃時、50%の確率で対象に火傷を付与する。(最大2ターンまで付与)
effect_desc1_kr: 단일 대상 공격 시 50% 확률로 대상에게 화상 최대 2턴 부여
effect_desc4: Has a 100% chance to inflict Burned for 2 turn(s) when attacking a single target
effect_desc4_jp: 敵単体を攻撃時、100%の確率で対象に火傷を付与する。(最大2ターンまで付与)
effect_desc4_kr: 단일 대상 공격 시 100% 확률로 대상에게 화상 최대 2턴 부여

name: Fire Fists
effect_desc1: Has a 50% chance to reduce the cooldown of an ultimate skill by 1 turn when killing an enemy
effect_desc1_jp: 敵を倒した時、50%の確率で必殺スキルのターンが1ターン減少する。
effect_desc1_kr: 적 처치 시 50% 확률로 필살기 쿨타임 1턴 감소
effect_desc4: Has a 100% chance to reduce the cooldown of an ultimate skill by 1 turn when killing an enemy
effect_desc4_jp: 敵を倒した時、100%の確率で必殺スキルのターンが1ターン減少する。
effect_desc4_kr: 적 처치 시 100% 확률로 필살기 쿨타임 1턴 감소

name: Royal Stinger
name_jp: ロイヤルスティンガー
effect_desc1: Heals the ally with the lowest Health by 15% when using a burst skill
effect_desc1_jp: バーストスキル使用時、残りHPが最も低い味方単体のHPが15%回復する。
effect_desc1_kr: 버스트 스킬 사용 시 가장 체력 비율이 낮은 아군 한명의 체력 15% 회복
effect_desc4: Heals the ally with the lowest Health by 30% when using a burst skill
effect_desc4_jp: バーストスキル使用時、残りHPが最も低い味方単体のHPが30%回復する。
effect_desc4_kr: 버스트 스킬 사용 시 가장 체력 비율이 낮은 아군 한명의 체력 30% 회복

name: Twin B
effect_desc1: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 1% each time when performing an action (max 10 stacks)
effect_desc1_jp: 行動時、会心率が1%ずつUPする。(最大10回まで累積)
effect_desc1_kr: 행동 시 치명 확률 1%씩 증가 (최대 10회 누적)
effect_desc4: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 2% each time when performing an action (max 10 stacks)
effect_desc4_jp: 行動時、会心率が2%ずつUPする。(最大10回まで累積)
effect_desc4_kr: 행동 시 치명 확률 2%씩 증가 (최대 10회 누적)

name: Force Field Generator
name_jp: フォースフィールドジェネレーター
effect_desc1: Grants a barrier to the caster equal to 2 of the caster's Max Health for 10% turn(s) when performing an action
effect_desc1_jp: 行動時、自分に最大HPの2のシールドを、10%ターンの間付与する。
effect_desc1_kr: 행동 시 자신에게 10%턴 동안 최대 체력의 2만큼의 실드 부여
effect_desc4: Grants a barrier to the caster equal to 2 of the caster's Max Health for 20% turn(s) when performing an action
effect_desc4_jp: 行動時、自分に最大HPの2のシールドを、20%ターンの間付与する。
effect_desc4_kr: 행동 시 자신에게 20%턴 동안 최대 체력의 2만큼의 실드 부여

name: Rampaging Caracal
effect_desc1: Has a 50% chance to inflict Marked for 1 turn(s) when attacking a single target
effect_desc1_jp: 敵単体を攻撃時、50%の確率で標的を1ターンの間付与する。
effect_desc1_kr: 단일 대상 공격 시 50% 확률로 1턴 동안 표식 효과 부여
effect_desc4: Has a 100% chance to inflict Marked for 1 turn(s) when attacking a single target
effect_desc4_jp: 敵単体を攻撃時、100%の確率で標的を1ターンの間付与する。
effect_desc4_kr: 단일 대상 공격 시 100% 확률로 1턴 동안 표식 효과 부여

name: Noblewoman's Guile
effect_desc1: Has a 35% chance to inflict Bleeding on all targets for 1 turn(s) when attacking all enemies
effect_desc1_jp: 全体攻撃時、対象に35%の確率で出血を1ターンの間付与する。
effect_desc1_kr: 전체 공격 시 35% 확률로 대상에게 1턴 동안 출혈 효과 부여
effect_desc4: Has a 70% chance to inflict Bleeding on all targets for 1 turn(s) when attacking all enemies
effect_desc4_jp: 全体攻撃時、対象に70%の確率で出血を1ターンの間付与する。
effect_desc4_kr: 전체 공격 시 70% 확률로 대상에게 1턴 동안 출혈 효과 부여

name: Emblem of Dominance
effect_desc1: Has a 50% chance to increase the Defense of all allies by 50% for 1 turn(s) when using a burst skill
effect_desc1_jp: バーストスキル使用時、50%の確率で味方全体の防御力を1ターンの間50%UPする。
effect_desc1_kr: 버스트 스킬 사용 시 50% 확률로 아군 전체에게 1턴 동안 방어력 증가
effect_desc4: Has a 100% chance to increase the Defense of all allies by 50% for 1 turn(s) when using a burst skill
effect_desc4_jp: バーストスキル使用時、100%の確率で味方全体の防御力を1ターンの間50%UPする。
effect_desc4_kr: 버스트 스킬 사용 시 100% 확률로 아군 전체에게 1턴 동안 방어력 증가

name: Violent Sledgehammer
name_jp: バイオレンススレッジ
effect_desc1: Increases damage dealt proportional to the caster's missing Health (Max 30%)
effect_desc1_jp: 自分の残りHPが低いほどダメージがUPする。(最大30%までダメージUP)
effect_desc1_kr: 자신의 체력이 낮아질수록 피해량 증가 (최대 30%)
effect_desc4: Increases damage dealt proportional to the caster's missing Health (Max 60%)
effect_desc4_jp: 自分の残りHPが低いほどダメージがUPする。(最大60%までダメージUP)
effect_desc4_kr: 자신의 체력이 낮아질수록 피해량 증가 (최대 60%)

name: Token of the Supreme Witch
effect_desc1: Has a 50% chance to remove 1 debuff from the caster when performing an action
effect_desc1_jp: 行動時、50%の確率で自分の弱体効果を1個解除する。
effect_desc1_kr: 행동 시 50% 확률로 자신에게 걸려있는 약화 효과 1개 해제
effect_desc4: Has a 100% chance to remove 1 debuff from the caster when performing an action
effect_desc4_jp: 行動時、100%の確率で自分の弱体効果を1個解除する。
effect_desc4_kr: 행동 시 100% 확률로 자신에게 걸려있는 약화 효과 1개 해제

name: Meteor Mashers
effect_desc1: Has a 50% chance to increase Evasion by 3% when scoring a critical hit (max 5 stacks)
effect_desc1_jp: 会心発生時、50%の確率で回避が3%ずつUPする。(最大5回まで累積)
effect_desc1_kr: 치명 공격 시 50% 확률로 회피 확률 3%씩 증가 (최대 5회 누적)
effect_desc4: Has a 50% chance to increase Evasion by 6% when scoring a critical hit (max 5 stacks)
effect_desc4_jp: 会心発生時、50%の確率で回避が6%ずつUPする。(最大5回まで累積)
effect_desc4_kr: 치명 공격 시 50% 확률로 회피 확률 6%씩 증가 (최대 5회 누적)

name: Thumping Knuckle Dusters
effect_desc1: Increases damage by 5% of the target's Attack when attacking
effect_desc1_jp: 攻撃時、対象の攻撃力5%分ダメージがUPする。
effect_desc1_kr: 공격 시 대상 공격력의 5%만큼 피해량 증가
effect_desc4: Increases damage by 10% of the target's Attack when attacking
effect_desc4_jp: 攻撃時、対象の攻撃力10%分ダメージがUPする。
effect_desc4_kr: 공격 시 대상 공격력의 10%만큼 피해량 증가

name: Iron Messiah
effect_desc1: When attacking a single target, grants a barrier equal to 15% of Max Health to the ally with the lowest Health for 1 turn(s)
effect_desc1_jp: 敵単体にスキル使用時、残りHPが最も低い味方単体に、最大HPの15%のシールドを1ターンの間付与する。
effect_desc1_kr: 단일 대상 공격 시 현재 체력이 가장 낮은 아군에게 1턴 동안 최대 체력의 15%만큼의 실드 부여
effect_desc4: When attacking a single target, grants a barrier equal to 30% of Max Health to the ally with the lowest Health for 1 turn(s)
effect_desc4_jp: 敵単体にスキル使用時、残りHPが最も低い味方単体に、最大HPの30%のシールドを1ターンの間付与する。
effect_desc4_kr: 단일 대상 공격 시 현재 체력이 가장 낮은 아군에게 1턴 동안 최대 체력의 30%만큼의 실드 부여

name: Snow-white Embrace
name_jp: エンジェルエンブレイス
effect_desc1: +20% damage dealt to enemies when at Max Health
effect_desc1_jp: 残りHPが100%の場合、敵に与えるダメージが+20%UPする。
effect_desc1_kr: 최대 체력일 때, 적에게 입히는 피해 +20%
effect_desc4: +40% damage dealt to enemies when at Max Health
effect_desc4_jp: 残りHPが100%の場合、敵に与えるダメージが+40%UPする。
effect_desc4_kr: 최대 체력일 때, 적에게 입히는 피해 +40%

name: God Hand Crush
name_jp: ゴッドハンドクラッシュ
effect_desc1: Before attacking, has a 50% chance to reduce Action Points of the target by 15 (Excluding Skill Chains and Dual Attacks)
effect_desc1_jp: 攻撃前、50%の確率で対象のAPを15にさせる。(チェーンスキルと連携を除く)
effect_desc1_kr: 공격 전 50% 확률로 대상의 AP 15 (스킬 체인 및 협공 제외)
effect_desc4: Before attacking, has a 100% chance to reduce Action Points of the target by 15 (Excluding Skill Chains and Dual Attacks)
effect_desc4_jp: 攻撃前、100%の確率で対象のAPを15にさせる。(チェーンスキルと連携を除く)
effect_desc4_kr: 공격 전 100% 확률로 대상의 AP 15 (스킬 체인 및 협공 제외)

name: Legacy of the Dream
effect_desc1: Has a 30% chance to reduce all skill cooldowns by 1 turn when using a basic attack (Excluding Burst)
effect_desc1_jp: 通常スキルで攻撃時、30%の確率でスキルターンを1ターン減少させる。バーストスキルでは発動しない。
effect_desc1_kr: 기본 공격 시 30% 확률로 모든 스킬 쿨타임 -1턴 (버스트 제외)
effect_desc4: Has a 60% chance to reduce all skill cooldowns by 1 turn when using a basic attack (Excluding Burst)
effect_desc4_jp: 通常スキルで攻撃時、60%の確率でスキルターンを1ターン減少させる。バーストスキルでは発動しない。
effect_desc4_kr: 기본 공격 시 60% 확률로 모든 스킬 쿨타임 -1턴 (버스트 제외)

name: Last Hope
effect_desc1: Increases damage dealt of basic attacks by 10% (Excluding Burst)
effect_desc1_jp: 通常スキルのダメージが10%UPする。バーストスキルでは発動しない。
effect_desc1_kr: 기본 공격의 피해량 10% (버스트 제외)
effect_desc4: Increases damage dealt of basic attacks by 20% (Excluding Burst)
effect_desc4_jp: 通常スキルのダメージが20%UPする。バーストスキルでは発動しない。
effect_desc4_kr: 기본 공격의 피해량 20% (버스트 제외)

name: Barrage of Truth
name_jp: 真・貫突スラッシャー
effect_desc1: Has a 6% chance to grant an extra turn when using a single-target skill
effect_desc1_jp: 敵単体にスキル使用時、6%の確率で追加ターンを獲得する。
effect_desc1_kr: 단일 대상 스킬 사용 시 6% 확률로 추가 턴 획득
effect_desc4: Has a 12% chance to grant an extra turn when using a single-target skill
effect_desc4_jp: 敵単体にスキル使用時、12%の確率で追加ターンを獲得する。
effect_desc4_kr: 단일 대상 스킬 사용 시 12% 확률로 추가 턴 획득

name: Phantasm Necrosis
effect_desc1: Reduces Speed of the wielder by 30%, and reduces damage taken / increases Counterattack chance proportional to missing Health (Max: 10%/10%)
effect_desc1_jp: 自分のスピードが30%DOWNする。残りのHPが低いほど、受けるダメージが最大10%までDOWNし、反撃発生率が最大10%UPする。
effect_desc1_kr: 자신의 속도 30%, 잃은 체력 비례하여 받는 피해 감소/반격 확률 증가(최대 10%/10%)
effect_desc4: Reduces Speed of the wielder by 30%, and reduces damage taken / increases Counterattack chance proportional to missing Health (Max: 20%/20%)
effect_desc4_jp: 自分のスピードが30%DOWNする。残りのHPが低いほど、受けるダメージが最大20%までDOWNし、反撃発生率が最大20%UPする。
effect_desc4_kr: 자신의 속도 30%, 잃은 체력 비례하여 받는 피해 감소/반격 확률 증가(최대 20%/20%)

name: Exquisite Death
name_jp: エクスクィジット・デスブレード
effect_desc1: Increases damage dealt by allies proportional to the <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> of the wielder (Excluding the wielder)
effect_desc1_jp: 自分の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>が高いほど、自分を除く味方全体の与えるダメージがUPする。
effect_desc1_kr: 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>에 비례하여, 아군이 입히는 피해 증가 (자신 제외)
effect_desc4: Increases damage dealt by allies proportional to the <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> of the wielder (Excluding the wielder)
effect_desc4_jp: 自分の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>が高いほど、自分を除く味方全体の与えるダメージがUPする。
effect_desc4_kr: 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>에 비례하여, 아군이 입히는 피해 증가 (자신 제외)

name: Immortal Pride
name_jp: プライド・オブ・イモータル
effect_desc1: Increases the healing received by allies by 5%
effect_desc1_jp: 味方が受ける回復効果が5%UPする。
effect_desc1_kr: 아군 받는 회복 효과 5%
effect_desc4: Increases the healing received by allies by 10%
effect_desc4_jp: 味方が受ける回復効果が10%UPする。
effect_desc4_kr: 아군 받는 회복 효과 10%

name: Sublime Melody
effect_desc1: Has a 15% chance to inflict Stunned for 1 turn when attacking a single target
effect_desc1_jp: 敵単体を攻撃時、対象に15%の確率でスタンを1ターンの間付与する。
effect_desc1_kr: 단일 대상 공격 시 15% 확률로 대상 스턴 +1턴
effect_desc4: Has a 30% chance to inflict Stunned for 1 turn when attacking a single target
effect_desc4_jp: 敵単体を攻撃時、対象に30%の確率でスタンを1ターンの間付与する。
effect_desc4_kr: 단일 대상 공격 시 30% 확률로 대상 스턴 +1턴

name: Fierce Soloist
name_jp: フィアス・ソリスター
effect_desc1: Has a 50% chance to grant Increased Speed to the wielder for 1 turn after using a non-attack skill
effect_desc1_jp: 攻撃以外のスキルを使用時、50%の確率で自分のスピードを1ターンの間UPさせる。
effect_desc1_kr: 공격이 아닌 스킬 사용 시 50% 확률로 자신의 속도 +1턴
effect_desc4: Has a 100% chance to grant Increased Speed to the wielder for 1 turn after using a non-attack skill
effect_desc4_jp: 攻撃以外のスキルを使用時、100%の確率で自分のスピードを1ターンの間UPさせる。
effect_desc4_kr: 공격이 아닌 스킬 사용 시 100% 확률로 자신의 속도 +1턴

name: Adventurer's Sword
effect_desc1: Has a 15% chance to increase Penetration for 1 turn after taking an action
effect_desc1_jp: 行動後、15%の確率で貫通力が+1ターンの間UPする。
effect_desc1_kr: 행동 후 15% 확률로 관통력 +1턴
effect_desc4: Has a 30% chance to increase Penetration for 1 turn after taking an action
effect_desc4_jp: 行動後、30%の確率で貫通力が+1ターンの間UPする。
effect_desc4_kr: 행동 후 30% 확률로 관통력 +1턴

name: Briareos's Recklessness [Striker]
name_jp: ブリアレオスの蛮勇【攻撃型】
effect_desc1: Has a 50% chance to grant increased Defense for 1 turn after using a Single Target skill (Activated only once every 2 turns)
effect_desc1_jp: 敵単体にスキル使用後、50%の確率で防御力を1ターンの間UPする。(2ターンに1回のみ発動)
effect_desc1_kr: 단일 대상 스킬 사용 후 50% 확률로 방어력 +1턴 (2턴에 1회만 발동)
effect_desc4: Has a 100% chance to grant increased Defense for 1 turn after using a Single Target skill (Activated only once every 2 turns)
effect_desc4_jp: 敵単体にスキル使用後、100%の確率で防御力を1ターンの間UPする。(2ターンに1回のみ発動)
effect_desc4_kr: 단일 대상 스킬 사용 후 100% 확률로 방어력 +1턴 (2턴에 1회만 발동)

name: Briareos's Recklessness [Defender]
name_jp: ブリアレオスの蛮勇【防御型】
effect_desc1: Has a 15% chance to inflict Taunted on the target for 1 turn after attacking a single target.
effect_desc1_jp: 敵単体を攻撃時、15%の確率で対象を1ターンの間挑発する。
effect_desc1_kr: 단일 대상 공격 후 15% 확률로 대상 도발 +1턴
effect_desc4: Has a 30% chance to inflict Taunted on the target for 1 turn after attacking a single target.
effect_desc4_jp: 敵単体を攻撃時、30%の確率で対象を1ターンの間挑発する。
effect_desc4_kr: 단일 대상 공격 후 30% 확률로 대상 도발 +1턴

name: Briareos's Recklessness [Ranger]
name_jp: ブリアレオスの蛮勇【スピード型】
effect_desc1: Has a 50% chance to grant increased Effectiveness for 1 turn before using an attack that targets all enemies.
effect_desc1_jp: 全体攻撃使用前、50%の確率で効果命中+1ターン
effect_desc1_kr: 전체 범위 스킬 사용 전 50% 확률로 효과 적중 +1턴
effect_desc4: Has a 100% chance to grant increased Effectiveness for 1 turn before using an attack that targets all enemies.
effect_desc4_jp: 全体攻撃使用前、100%の確率で効果命中+1ターン
effect_desc4_kr: 전체 범위 스킬 사용 전 100% 확률로 효과 적중 +1턴

name: Briareos's Recklessness [Mage]

effect_desc1: When using an attack that targets all enemies, increases damage dealt by 10%

name: Briareos's Recklessness [Healer]
name_jp: ブリアレオスの蛮勇【回復型】
effect_desc1: Grants Stealth to the ally with the lowest Health for 1 turn after using a Burst Skill (Activated only once every 5 turn(s))
effect_desc1_jp: バーストスキル使用後、残りHPが最も低い味方単体に隠れ身を1ターンの間付与する。(5に1回のみ発動)
